NO.CAS-5(11)/2/2004.Div.I 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date   : 26.07.2006 
 
 
Circular No.  08/ 2006 
 
Sub: Installation of  Bio-metric  system  at  all  Hyper-sensitive  airports. 
 
In terms of MCA letter no. AV-13024/27/2003-SS dated 13-07-2006 
regarding the minutes of the meeting taken by MOS (CA) on 12-07-2006, AAI 
and the concerned Airport Operators shall take immediate necessary action to 
install Bio-metric systems at all airports in India as early as possible commencing 
with Hyper-sensitive airports with immediate effect.  
 
Specifications for the Bio-metric system shall be communicated to all 
airport operators by the BCAS within 6 weeks.  
 
 
 
(M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
